mapper.select: select * from (select MENU.NUM, MENU.CATEGORY_NUM, MENU.MENU, MENU.PRICE, MENU.USING, MENU_IMAGE.SAVE_NAME from MENU left outer join MENU_IMAGE on MENU.MENU = MENU_IMAGE.MENU) M where M.USING =1 and M.CATEGORY_NUM=#{num} order by M.NUM

select * from (select M.NUM, M.CATEGORY_NUM, M.MENU, M.PRICE, M.USING, M.SAVE_NAME, CATEGORY.TYPE from (select MENU.NUM, MENU.CATEGORY_NUM, MENU.MENU, MENU.PRICE, MENU.USING, MENU_IMAGE.SAVE_NAME from MENU left outer join MENU_IMAGE on MENU.MENU = MENU_IMAGE.MENU) M left outer join CATEGORY on M.CATEGORY_NUM = CATEGORY.NUM) C where C.USING =1 and C.NUM=#{num}
